about_the_game:
Dungeons of Edera 2 is an action RPG in which you must wage brutal guerrilla warfare on an overwhelming enemy. Take advantage of powerful abilities, classes, and tactics. As a sword-for-hire, explore immersive environments, compete for contracts across a range of factions, and tip the tide of war in your favor. You must scour the lands of Edera for supplies and legendary loot, and become a mercenary of legend - alone or with friends.

Return to Edera

The land teeters on the brink of catastrophe. Old enemies return from the shadows to terrorize the lands and keep your allies separated and hopeless. Take charge of a band of mercenaries and stake your claim on the conflict.

Ply Your Violent Trade

Choose and customize your character from a pool of rag-tag fighters, wizards and rogues, each with their own skills, equipment, and abilities to overcome your enemies. Level up and explore each talent tree to make each class your own.

Make Your Fortune

Conquer treacherous dungeons, defeat formidable bosses, and claim legendary loot. Craft rare weapons and armor to bolster your arsenal. Win favor from the various factions to unlock exclusive classes, abilities, and rewards.

Unending Warfare

Reach the pinnacle of power and face off against formidable foes in endless challenge modes that will test your grit and reward you handsomely, if you can survive.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10（64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX960
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10（64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-11600k
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX1660
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
